changelog.1.0.1: Fixed Return not being accepted in text fields.
changelog.1.0.2: Fixed Icons disappearing upon loading. Fixed issues with setting cost values
changelog.1.0.3: Changed the spell list to include more spells from various sources. Added ritual tags to spells.
changelog.1.0.4: Inventory reworks. Added russian translation. R20 integration has the option to do a multiroll.
changelog.1.0.5: Fixed some translation issues. Double click now opens selected item/spell. Added russian translation for spells. Fixed a minor issue in the general tab. Added portraits.
changelog.1.1.0: Added scrollbars for all tabs. Added first scripts draft, for now without documentation, added automatic version check
changelog.1.1.1: Added proper script functionality. Added extra packet types for R20 integration.
changelog.1.1.3: App no longer asks to save a blank file. Removed legacy components.
changelog.1.1.4: Updated the target to .net 4.8. App now restarts on language changes. Made the UI more consistent. Removed a lot of unnecessary references. Added NLua to the list of 3rd party libraries.
changelog.1.1.5: Added a dark skin. Added a reverse UI generator for scripting.
